document.id: City of San Mateo, Cal., Ord. No. 2010-2
document.heading: Adding Section 5.03.315, "Tax Collector," to Chapter 5.03, "Definitions," and Adding Section 5.12.020, "Constitutional Apportionment," to Chapter 5.12, "Tax Return Filing-Issuance of Certificate," of the San Mateo Municipal Code

citations.citation: City of San Mateo, Cal., Ord. No. 2010-2
